section.p: Indicates the Veteran's involvement in a specific period of war.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] conflictCode with data type Code
The specific war the Vet was involved in.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRange with data type Time Interval
The date range of the war or conflict.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique identifier for the war.

Contains exactly one [1..1] prisonerOfWar, where its type is Prisoner Of War
prisonerOfWar.

Contains exactly one [1..1] conflictCode with data type Code
The specific war the Vet was involved in.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRange with data type Time Interval
The date range of the war or conflict.

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
A unique identifier for the war.

Contains exactly one [1..1] prisonerOfWar, where its type is Prisoner Of War
prisonerOfWar.
